net.sparkzz.modest

Class ModestGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sparkzz.modest.ModestGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Test

    public class ModestGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Command Based Game API

    Simple, yet powerful console based game/application API.

    Since:
    0.1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModestGame() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Logger getDefaultLogger()
      Default logger, should only be accessed by API classes.
      protected Logger getLogger()
      Can be overwritten to return sub-class logger.
      protected void init()
      The initial setup of the program.
      protected void interrupt()
      This will halt the run loop.
      protected void postInit()
      To be run after initial setup is complete.
      protected void run()
      This will continuously loop the postInit() method.
      protected static void runOnce(boolean value)
      Sets the program to run the init() method only once.
      protected void saveLogs()
      This will save all the logs to a file, overwrites at close.
      protected static void setTicks(int ticks)
      This will set the max ticks of the program (default 10).

    • Method Detail

      • runOnce

        protected static void runOnce(boolean value)

        Sets the program to run the init() method only once.

        Parameters:
        value - Input Boolean.

      • setTicks

        protected static void setTicks(int ticks)

        This will set the max ticks of the program (default 10).

        Parameters:
        ticks - Input Integer.

      • getLogger

        protected Logger getLogger()

        Can be overwritten to return sub-class logger.

        Returns:
        Logger.

      • postInit

        protected void postInit()

        To be run after initial setup is complete.

        Will automatically be called unless the run() method is overridden.

      • init

        protected void init()

        The initial setup of the program.

        Will be automatically called unless the run() method is overridden.

      • interrupt

        protected void interrupt()

        This will halt the run loop.

      • run

        protected void run()

        This will continuously loop the postInit() method.

        This method doesn't need to be accessed/overrode for programs that don't need a run loop.

      • saveLogs

        protected void saveLogs()

        This will save all the logs to a file, overwrites at close.

      • getDefaultLogger

        public static Logger getDefaultLogger()

        Default logger, should only be accessed by API classes.

        Returns:
        The default (API Level) Logger.
